about_the_game:
**NOTE**
This game requires at least 1 controller. It can be played with either 1 controller 1 keyboard, or 2 controllers.

All of the joy of fireball wars with none of the pesky health in the way!

Fireball Spam is a fighting game with two buttons, jump and shoot (give or take). It's one shot-one kill in Fireball Spam, so make sure to dodge, intercept, and mind game your opponent to win! Play as 1 of 5 different characters as you fight for fireball supremacy!
'

Features

  • Fast-paced yet tense action
  • 5 character with different playstyles
  • Fireballs!
  • Sometimes not fireballs?
  • Bombs too!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Additional Notes: Must be played with at least 1 controller

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must be played with at least 1 controller

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must be played with at least 1 controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A two-button, 1 shot, 1 kill fighting game! Taking all of the action of fireball wars in other fighting games and upping the stakes with instantaneous death! No d-pad. No EX-moves, No frills. Just jump, shoot and win!
